title: Add navigation bar for future pages
description: Create a navigation bar that links to current pages and placeholders for future pages.

title: Add checkbox to simulate missing assignments at 100%
description: Add checkboxes next to missing assignments in the assignments log. When checked, simulate that assignment as if it was turned in and received 100% (full points). Recalculate the grade impact including all checked missing assignments. This allows users to see 'what if' scenarios for multiple missing assignments at once.
close_reason: Completed: Added checkboxes next to missing/pending assignments. When checked, assignments are simulated at 100% (full points). Calculator automatically recalculates when checkboxes change. Updated calculator to re-read assignments on each calculation to support dynamic updates.

title: Show calculation breakdown in grade calculator
description: Add a breakdown display in the grade calculator that shows the calculation steps: total points earned, total points possible, current grade calculation, and how the hypothetical assignment affects the projected grade. This helps users understand how the calculator arrives at its results.
close_reason: Completed: added calculation breakdown for current/projected totals in class and dashboard calculators

title: Count missing assignments as 0/total points in class views
description: Show missing items as 0/total on class pages and count them in calculator totals. Treat pending assignments with past due dates as missing; keep upcoming pending uncounted.
close_reason: Completed: missing/past-due pending show 0/total and count in calculator totals

title: Fix scraper: earnedPoints contains date data, totalPoints always 0
description: The scraper's XPath extraction is incorrectly parsing assignment data. earnedPoints contains corrupted date values (e.g., 242025 instead of score) and totalPoints is always 0. Only 1 of 120 assignments has correct data. Root cause: XPath selectors are extracting the wrong text nodes from the assignment detail dialog. Need to debug the dialog structure and fix the extraction logic in enhanced-scraper.cjs lines 338-405.

title: Fix Missing.Quests modal icon text
description: Replace garbled header icon text in the Missing.Quests modal with a clean label.
close_reason: Completed: replaced modal icon text with MQ

title: Fix Skyward scraper points extraction
description: Enhanced scraper returns earned/total points as 0 because it parses modal text; use provided DOM XPaths for earned (/html/body/div[6]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[4]/div/table/tbody/tr[2]/td[2]/text()[1]) and total (/text()[2]) plus due/assigned date XPaths to extract real values and update cached output.

title: Use scraped assignments in class calculators
description: Integrate scraped graded assignments/point totals into per-class GradeCalculator so results reflect actual points.
close_reason: Completed: Enhanced calculator to use scraped assignments with actual points. Added safety checks, improved filtering, and recalculates current grade from assignments for consistency.

title: Display dynamic Missing.Quests total
description: Expose total Missing.Quests count dynamically on UI title rather than static label.

title: Add Astro view transitions
description: Enable Astro view transitions across pages for smoother navigation.

title: Fix scraper: 0/0 total points for some assignments
description: Scraper still produces 0/0 points for some assignments (e.g., 'TO SERVER MAN-WRITING ASSIGNMENT' should be 0/40). Investigate extraction logic and ensure total points are captured.

title: Add testing component for visual layout experiments
description: Create a testing component/page to preview new visual layouts without altering the live site. Intended for rapid UI experiments; code to be reviewed later.

title: Round out percentage on the Assignment.Logs section
description: Round/format percentages shown in Assignment.Logs for consistent display (e.g., whole number or fixed decimals per UI standard).

title: Strip (Q2) from displayed dates
description: Remove '(Q2)' suffix from dates across the site; may require scraper normalization or frontend cleanup. Run tests after change.
close_reason: Completed: strip (Q2) from missing assignment dates in scraper and UI

title: Map scraped classIds to actual class metadata
description: Scraper groups assignments by classId correctly (9 groups), but classIdMap is not populated due to DOM traversal issues after page expansion. Need to map classIds (42889, 42895, 43049, 43162, 43424, 43666, 44014, 44290, 44463) to actual class names/periods/teachers from grades.json so class pages show correct metadata.

title: Add Missing.Quests modal with grade impact
description: On the home page Missing.Quests list, clicking an assignment should open a modal showing how turning it in would affect the class grade (e.g., scenario at 50% or configurable).
close_reason: Completed: Missing.Quests modal shows 50% impact estimate and class link

title: Fix scraped assign/due dates mis-populated with grades
description: AssignDate/DueDate fields in scraped assignments sometimes contain numeric grade values (e.g., '24'); parse should keep dates separate from points.

title: Fix Assignments log mobile layout
description: Assignments log is not mobile-friendly; adjust layout/styles for small screens.

title: Render scraped grades on class pages
description: Pipe scraped assignment data into /classes/[classId] views so per-class pages show real grades.

title: Remove assignDate from scraper output and normalize dueDate format
description: Remove assignDate fields from scraper outputs (raw + organized). Normalize dueDate to MM/DD/YYYY only in scraper data.

title: Accessibility scan and fixes
description: Scan the site for accessibility issues (labels, contrast, focus states, ARIA, keyboard navigation) and fix findings across core pages.
close_reason: Completed: added modal focus management and accessibility attributes, verified core interactions

title: Fix missing assignment checkbox grade update
description: Checkbox simulation on class pages does not update grade reliably. Update behavior so checking a missing assignment shows the updated grade (consider a popup that shows projected grade if turned in at 50%).

title: Add fun stats page with grade history chart
description: Create a stats page that uses grade_history to show fun, engaging metrics plus a chart.
